content:
You are Melius Engine, an autonomous AI agent. 
        Current Event/Request from event.json: mordenui-beach water them summer+maek sure all buttons work
        
        Repository files: ['DESIGN.md', 'README.md', 'LICENSE', 'event.json', 'test-website/index.html', 'test-website/vercel.json', 'test-website/package.json', 'test-website/styles.css', 'test-website/script.js', 'github-page/index.html', 'github-page/styles.css', 'github-page/script.js', 'docs/index.html', 'docs/styles.css', 'docs/script.js', 'docs/.nojekyll']
        Existing To-Dos: [{'file': 'test-website/index.html', 'pending': 'Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.'}, {'file': 'test-website/client/src/App.tsx', 'pending': "Add Link imports from 'wouter' for navigation elements"}, {'file': 'test-website/script.js', 'pending': 'The script.js file needs to be updated with the improved mobile menu toggle functionality as described in the intent.'}, {'file': 'test-website/script.js', 'pending': "Fix the syntax error by removing the word 'pełni' and re-implement the mobile menu toggle functionality with proper event handling, smooth transitions, and user-friendly interactions as described in the intent"}, {'file': 'test-website/client/src/App.tsx', 'pending': 'Add useState hook to manage mobile menu state'}, {'file': 'test-website/styles.css', 'pending': 'The CSS file needs to be updated with Egyptian-themed color palette and UI elements as described in the intent.'}, {'file': 'test-website/styles.css', 'pending': 'Fix the SVG data URL to include proper SVG content for Egyptian-themed patterns.'}]
        Existing Errors: []

        CONSTRAINTS:
        1. You can ONLY modify UI-related files (CSS, TSX components, basic UI theme).
        2. DO NOT modify build files, configurations, or dependencies (vercel.json, package.json, vite.config.ts, etc.).
        3. Do not ask to re-read files if they are already in the context.
        4. Focus exclusively on UI theme changes based on the event: mordenui-beach water them summer+maek sure all buttons work.
        
        Analyze the project and suggest UI/Theme improvements. 
        If you need to read specific files, list them in "files_to_read".
        
        
CRITICAL:
Return JSON in this exact format:

{
  "files_to_read": [],
  "analysis": "string",
  "improvements": [
    {
      "file": "relative/path.tsx",
      "description": "precise UI change"
    }
  ]
}

Do NOT add extra keys.
Do NOT nest improvements.
Do NOT return prose outside JSON.

{ "new_content": " Beach Paradise | Summer Fun
  • Home
  • Activities
  • Water Sports
  • Beach Info
  • Contact

Summer • Sun • Fun

Beach Paradise

Your Ultimate Summer Destination

🏰
🏰
🏰
🐚
🌴
Welcome to Paradise
☀️
🌊
🏖️
🐠
🍹

Beach Activities

Enjoy a variety of fun activities at our beautiful beach. From sunbathing to beach volleyball, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

  • Sunbathing: Relax on our soft, sandy beach.
  • Beach Volleyball: Join a game with friends or family.
  • Beachcombing: Search for seashells and other treasures.
  • Picnicking: Enjoy a meal with a view of the ocean.

Water Sports

Dive into adventure with our exciting water sports. Whether you're a beginner or an expert, we have activities for all skill levels.

  • Surfing: Catch the perfect wave.
  • Snorkeling: Explore the underwater world.
  • Kayaking: Paddle through calm waters.
  • Jet Skiing: Experience the thrill of speed.

Beach Information

  • Location: 123 Beach Road, Paradise Island
  • Hours: 6:00 AM - 8:00 PM Daily
  • Facilities: Showers, restrooms, snack bar, and equipment rentals
  • Safety: Lifeguards on duty from 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

Book Your Beach Experience

Ready to experience the ultimate beach vacation? Book your activities and accommodations now!

Get in Touch

Have questions or need assistance? We're here to help!

Beach Paradise - Your Summer Destination

Back to top ↑
Enjoy Your Time at the Beach
